data.title: Hidden Gem – Brand New Curated Home w Pool Access
data.description: Superbly designed for living, relaxing and entertaining – this remarkable townhome has everything that you need! The calming color palette with warm wooden furniture and playful jewel-toned accent pieces gives the home a grounded and serenely relaxing atmosphere. Interior highlights include three spacious bedrooms with plush new mattresses and walk-in closets, a luxurious ensuite primary bathroom, and a cozy living area with plenty of comfortable seating. Whether you are searching for a retirement getaway, interim family home, or a full-service getaway – this brand-new townhome in the intimate Mosaic neighborhood is the perfect choice!Enjoy the best of Fort Collins, right out your door! This beautiful, new townhome is centrally located and perfect for those looking to experience the true atmosphere of Fort Collins. Head up to Lory State Park and explore the hiking/biking trails, hop over to Odell for a cold fresh beer, or head downtown for an evening of live music and culinary delights. Then head home for a relaxing evening in your home away from home! You will love this intimate community within 10 minutes of the brewery district, Old Town Fort Collins and CSU. Conveniently located between Old Town and I-25, this brand-new townhome is the perfect choice for an extended stay in Fort Collins!This home features: Bedroom 1: King Bed (second level) | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed (second level) | Bedroom 3: Twin Trundle Bed (second level) | Sleeps 6 OUTDOOR LIVING:  Main level patio with a small bistro table and mountain views! There is also a community pool that is open May – September, a short 5-minute walk from this townhome! INDOOR LIVING:  Smart TV, dining table with seating for 6, laptop-friendly workspace KITCHEN:  Fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, microwave, breakfast bar with seating for 2, cooking basics, dishware/flatware, spices, complimentary coffee, creamer, tea and sweetener BATHROOMS:  There is a main floor half bath and two bathrooms on the upper level. We include hair dryers, soap, shampoo and conditioner for every guest stay. GENERAL:  High-speed WiFi, washer/dryer, linens/towels, keyless entry, central heating and air conditioning, complimentary toiletries, iron/board and cleaning essentials.  PARKING:  Two car garage and street parking is also available HOUSE RULES: No smokingNo events, parties, or large gatherings PET POLICY:  Dogs Welcome...We love dogs! However... all pets must be pre-approved (no aggressive breeds) and a pet fee will be due at booking. Unapproved pets and excessive barking or aggression are grounds for removal of pets from the property or eviction of tenants.  COMMUNITY POOL:  The community pool is open from Memorial Day to Labor Day! If your stay falls within that period, you will have access to the community pool which is conveniently located a 5-minute walk down the road. Pass is required.  NOTE:  This property is located near the Fort Collins train line which run through downtown. The train is part of the history and economy of Fort Collins and is an integral part of what Fort Collins is today. The train may be heard occasionally during your stay.   Mountain Time Vacation Rentals  is owned and operated by locals with a passion for hospitality and our amazing mountain community.  We have over 100 homes to choose from which can accommodate groups of 2 to 200.  Our Commitment to Clean: All homes and linens are professionally cleaned, sanitized, and disinfected before each and every guest. Feel free to send us an inquiry so we can help you plan the perfect getaway!

A Hidden Paradise - Bungalow 1
data.description: Welcome to Hidden Paradise! Ready for an unforgettable vacation? Bungalow #1 is a lovely home perfect of up to 6 guests. Located just a short walk from the beautiful crystal sands and community pool, this home is directly in the heart of the vibrant South Siesta Key Village. Relax by the shared community pool located at the Calini Beach Club or venture on a stroll to the beach. With 13 public beach access points, wonderful shops and restaurants, Siesta Key promises great experiences for everyone who visits. Take advantage of the tranquil waters, soft sand, and warm sun as you explore all the island has to offer and unwind at the end of a fantastic day in this beautiful home.Bedding and Televisions:Bedroom 1 - King, TVBedroom 2 - TwinsLiving room - Sleeper Sofa, TVUnit Size - 624 Sq. Ft.Added Amenities Included in Your Stay:Complimentary Bicycles Rentals,One Complimentary Parking Space,Wifi,Beach Chairs,Beach Towels,Beach Wagon,Beach Cooler,Partner Property Pool/Hot tub Access,Access to Siesta Beach Pickleball Courts,Siesta Key Trolley - Free-Rides Around Siesta Key,A 7-day week, Beachside Management office for your convenience and guest needs!Minimum Age Requirement: 23*Minimum age requirement from February 1st through April 15th for all Beachside Managed properties is 27 years of age

data.title: A Las Palmas
data.description: Welcome to Las Palmas! This gorgeous new home on Siesta Key offers luxury around every turn. Stay with up to 16 guests in this 7-bedroom, 7.5-bathroom home, complete with a private pool and spa area, fenced in yard, large full kitchen, dining room, two living spaces with a game room, and much more! Spend time outside by the pool, featuring a kid’s slide, rain curtain, pool fountains, and hot tub, all conveniently position by the patio lounge area with a BBQ grill, Mini Fridge and plenty of space for everyone to relax. Located around the corner form Siesta Key Village, this home sits across the street from beach access numbers 8 and 9. Guests can gaze out at the ocean and enjoy beautiful sunset skies from the rooftop patio or take the short walk into the Village for the many wonder shops and restaurants Siesta Key has to offer. Capture your piece of paradise with this fabulous new home. *Events possible upon request.Bedding and Televisions:Bedroom 1 – King, TVBedroom 2 – King, TVBedroom 3 – King, TVBedroom 4 – King, TVBedroom 5 – King, TVBedroom 6 – King, TVBedroom 7 – Double Twin Bunk Beds,Living Room 1 – TVLiving Room 2 – TVUnit Size - 5,000 Sq. This unit, located on the 2nd floor above the garage, has 3 bedroom, 2/5 bathrooms and can sleep up to 9 guests. This home is perfectly located 0.1 miles from beach access #11, offering quick access to the #1 rated Siesta Beach! data.title: A Tide that Binds Us - 600
data.description: Spend your vacation relaxing in this lovely 3-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom townhome. On the ground level, you will find covered parking for up to 2 cars, and storage. The second level hosts an open concept for the living room, dining, and kitchen areas. The spacious living room features rattan ceiling panels for a casual coastal vibe. The kitchen offers plenty of storage and stainless countertops. On this floor, you will also find a powder room and a balcony for enjoying the fresh island breeze. The 3 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms are located on the third level. The master bedroom includes 2 bathing areas, one of which is open to the bedroom and has a jetted bathtub. Located within walking distance to Siesta Key Village, this home is adjacent to beach access #10 – perfect for taking a trip down to Siesta Beach! *This property is stairs only; all guests must have the ability to use stairs.Bedroom 1 – KingBedroom 2 – QueenBedroom 3 – Two DoublesLivingroom – Queen Sleeper SofaUnit Size - 1,292 Sq. data.title: A Tide that Binds Us - 602
data.description: Spend your vacation relaxing in this lovely 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom townhome. On the ground level, you will find parking for up to 2 cars. The second level hosts a spacious living room, dining, and kitchen areas. The kitchen offers plenty of storage and stainless countertops. The living room offers space for the entire family to relax with large windows looking out towards the beach. On this floor, you will also find a powder room and the first of two balconies for enjoying the fresh island breeze and ocean view. The 3 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, and second balcony are located on the third level. This home features 2 livings rooms, a full kitchen, and plenty of space for the whole family. data.title: Beach Residences On Siesta, aka The Hyatt
data.description: Siesta Key’s only luxury hotel. Sitting directly on Siesta’s Quartz Beach that offers the whitest and softest sand in the World that is always cool to the touch. Relaxing and making your memories is all that’s required but located just minutes is down town’s rich art and cultural community. In the village of Siesta, you’ll be welcomed to enjoy a cool beverage under the palm trees while listening to live music, take a stroll while you shop, or find many great local cuisines. Make sure to look for the local dolphins frolicking in our crystal-clear waters of the Gulf of Mexico. Siesta Key beach, rated #1 in the country. The memories will linger long after your footprints in the sand have been washed away by the gentle waves.Our stunning accommodations need to be experienced to be believed. The spacious floor plan is perfect for family vacations. Our suite is well appointed to 5-star standards and resort-quality amenities including multiple flat screen TVs, Bose® sound systems, jetted oversized bathtubs and multi-head rain showers, king-size Grand Beds, and a fully-stocked kitchens complete with Wolf, Miele and Sub Zero appliances. Resort fee covers the following items: complimentary valet parking, premium high speed wireless internet, local calls, newspaper, business center with print me station, notary service, Stay Fit health club, bike rentals, laptops based on request, in-room safe barbeque grills, in room coffee/tea, beach services (chairs, umbrellas, towels), and water sport rentals (kayaks, paddleboards, floats).Bedroom 1- KingBedroom 2- KingBedroom 3- Queen Murphy BedUnit Size - 1,900 Sq. Ft.Please Note: Golf-Carts are NOT allowed on property grounds.*Minimum age requirement from February 1st through April 15th for all Beachside Managed properties is 27 years of age
data.image_tag: Beach Residences On Siesta, aka The Hyatt

data.title: Beach Walk
data.description: Featuring high ceilings and a spacious living area this 3-bedroom, 2.5-bath, beautifully renovated townhouse condominium presents the best Siesta Key has to experience. This multifloored unit offers the convenience of condominium living without a high-rise building. One of four townhomes in the Beach Walk complex, this home features lush tropical landscaping, paver walks, drive, and heated community pool. You will love the covered and screened outdoor rec space. Some of the features include a TV and ping pong table. Just out the door you’ll find grilling and a pool for your enjoyment. Located only a half block from the famous white sands of Siesta Beach, the No. 1 beach in the US and close to Siesta Village’s unique boutiques and restaurants, this unit is the perfect island getaway. Only 20 minutes by car to downtown Sarasota’s urban amenities, shopping, restaurants, museums, and entertainment. Just bring your sunscreen, bathing suit, and flip-flops! *Stairs only. All guests must have the ability to use stairs.*No parking in garage*Bedroom 1- KingBedroom 2- King with a work stationBedroom 3- QueenLiving Room- Queen Sleeper SofaUnit Size - 1,691 Sq. Ft.Added Amenities Included in Your Stay:Complimentary Bicycles Rentals,One Complimentary Parking Space,Wifi,Beach Chairs,Beach Towels,Beach Wagon,Beach Cooler,Partner Property Pool/Hot tub Access,Access to Siesta Beach Pickleball Courts,Siesta Key Trolly - Free-Rides Around Siesta Key,A 7-day week, Beachside Management office for your convenience and guest needs!Minimum Age Requirement: 25*Minimum age requirement from February 1st through April 15th for all Beachside Managed properties is 27 years of age

data.title: Whispering Pines - Enjoy a hot tub retreat | Near Mt. Hood | Pet-friendly
data.description:
Nestled amidst towering pine trees, Whispering Pines Cabin invites you to unwind near the iconic Mt. Hood. This rustic-modern blend is perfect for those seeking tranquility and adventure. Imagine soaking in a luxurious hot tub, truly invigorating after exploring scenic trails. The warm glow of the wood stove creates a cozy atmosphere, ideal for restful evenings. Whether sipping coffee on the deck or enjoying local exploits, this cabin promises a memorable escape. Secure your stay and indulge in the peaceful retreat that you've been dreaming of.The SpaceEscape to Whispering Pines Cabin, near Mt. Hood, for a relaxing retreat. Enjoy the invigorating hot tub and the rustic-modern comforts this cabin offers.

✔ Bask in the charm of open-beam ceilings and wood paneling
✔ Experience the warmth envelop you by the wood stove, with a novel in hand
✔ Spacious living area with plush seating and a Smart TV
✔ Fully equipped kitchen, ready for your culinary adventures
✔ Primary and second bedrooms with comfortable queen beds
✔ Bunk room designed with kids in mind
✔ Private deck perfect for morning coffee or evening relaxation
✔ Expansive yard for outdoor games, grilling, and unwinzing amidst nature
✔ Lush, luxurious hot tub for soothing evening soaks
✔ Shop with ski and snowboard storage and basketball hoop
✔ Assorted board games for fun-filled family timeGuest Access✔ Reliable free Wi-Fi to stay connected
✔ Fully equipped kitchen for delightful meals
✔ Wood stove with complimentary firewood
✔ Outdoor deck with seating and barbecue grill
✔ Ample on-site parking, hassle-free
✔ Welcoming pet policy, with prior approval and fee
✔ Convenient self check-in via smart lockNeighborhoodRelish the captivating charm around Mt. Hood, with Whispering Pines Cabin as your perfect launchpad. Situated near the tranquil Zig Zag River, adventure awaits nearby with hiking and skiing opportunities. Explore local dining gems or indulge in serene leisure amidst the picturesque backdrop. Whispering Pines is your gateway to natural beauty and endless experiences—reservations are just a click away!Other Things To Note✔ Kindly observe quiet hours for a peaceful neighborhood retreat
✔ Essentials like shampoo, conditioner, and body soap provided
✔ Pet friendly with prior approval, including a $100 pet feeGetting AroundWhether you’re seeking a quiet retreat surrounded by nature or an adventure-filled getaway near Mt. Hood, this cabin has it all. Relax by the fire after a day of exploring, or step outside to enjoy the tranquil sounds of the forest. With its convenient location and cozy atmosphere, this Rhododendron cabin offers the perfect escape for families, couples, and small groups.

Mt. Hood Skibowl: Just 20 minutes away for skiing, snowboarding, and tubing in the winter, and thrilling adventure parks in the summer.
Zigzag River & Hiking Trails: A short walk away (few minutes) from the cabin, ideal for nature walks and exploring the stunning local scenery.
Timberline Lodge: 30 minutes away for historic tours, skiing, and breathtaking views.
ZigZag Mountain Trailhead is less than a quarter mile away with many more hiking trails near by. 
Trillium Lake for kayaking and paddleboarding is just 15 miles away. House RulesCancellation Terms: Fully refundable up to 5 days before check in, then booking becomes non refundable. 
Payment Terms: 50% is due at booking and remainder 30 days before check in. If booking checks in less than 30 days 100% is due at booking.
Please respect quite hours and this is a community. 
Not glass or food while in the hot tub. 
No pets without pet fee, no cats
Minimum Age to Book: 21
Additional Rules may apply in Guest Guide Book
Pets: Dogs only, no cats. Only permitted with applicable pet fee.

data.title: Such Great Heights
data.description: Offering beautiful year-round mountain views and a hot tub to soak your worries away, this private log cabin is located within Gateway Mountain's 3,000-acre nature preserve. Gather around the solo stove on the open-air deck, spend your afternoons reading in the hammock, or enjoy access to a gorgeous waterfall hike in the community. Gateway Mountain also has two small lakes and a trout pond for catch-and-release fishing (no license required). Embrace serenity, seclusion, and scenery at "Such Great Heights!"About the Home• Open concept living room with cozy seating, overlooking the view, and dining area for 6• Kitchen with breakfast bar seating for 2, drip-style coffee maker, and dishwasher• Spacious, open-air deck with Solo Stove, hammock, seating, and bistro lighting• 4-person hot tub to soak and enjoy long-range mountain views• Lower-level den with 65" RokuTV for streaming and seatingWhere to Unwind• Upper-level primary bedroom with king-size bed and en suite bathroom with bathtub and shower combination• Two main-floor bedrooms, each with a queen-size bed; a full bathroom can be accessed from the hallway• Lower-level bedroom with queen-size bed; a full bathroom can be accessed from the hallwayWhere to Explore• Nearest Gas, Sunoco | 18 minutes• Hillman Brewing, Old Fort | 19 minutes• Nearest Grocery, Frisbee's Piggly Wiggly | 21 minutes• Catawba Falls Trail Head | 25 minutes• Downtown Black Mountain | 28 minutes• The Biltmore Estate | 42 minutes• Downtown Asheville | 43 minutes• Want to enjoy more of a stay-cation, without leaving the gates of Gateway Mountain? Be sure to check out the community's very own amenities like the floating dock on Lake George, hiking trails, and gorgeous waterfalls!Please Note: There is an exterior security camera along the driveway. This home allows up to 2 dogs with an additional pet fee.

data.title: Luxe Loft
data.description: This posh, sun-filled apartment is conveniently located less than a 5-minute drive from downtown Black Mountain, and it's an easy 20-minute drive to downtown Asheville. The Flat Creek Greenway is also right outside your door! Impeccably furnished with West Elm decor & furniture, this airy 800 sq. feet loft boasts a lofted ceiling, a customized chef's kitchen, and a compact balcony with bistro seating to enjoy!Please note: Dogs are welcome during your stay for an additional fee. Due to the owner's allergies, regretfully no cats are allowed. The loft has a private entrance and enough parking space for one car. The main house and garage are NOT part of the rental. There is also an LG washer and dryer for your convenience.

data.title: Hilltop Lodge on Lake James
data.description: Enjoy Lake James in luxury at Hilltop Lodge—an impeccably furnished pet-friendly home that offers a private boat dock & small beach area with lake access, an outdoor kitchenette that includes a gas grill, an outdoor fire pit area, a screened porch, and countless upscale amenities!Upon entering the main level of this stately home, you'll immediately be greeted by the sleek open floor plan that is complemented by the elegant black trim along the windows and glass doors. Get cozy in the living room centered around a stone gas fireplace and smart TV with streaming capabilities. Relax on the screened porch (accessible from the living room) which offers patio seating and an outdoor dining table for enjoying meals al fresco without worrying about natural elements interfering, or opt to enjoy dinner inside at the dining table with similar woodland views and seating for 8. Seasoned chefs and amateur foodies alike will delight in the gourmet kitchen which boasts stainless appliances, a gas range stove, and quartz countertops with ample space for chopping and prepping.The upper level consists of the primary bedroom with a King bed and en suite bath while the lower level provides a den area with patio access, one Queen bedroom, one King bedroom, and a bunk room with two sets of bunks (full-size on the bottom & twin size on top), making it a convenient option for intergenerational families with different needs traveling together. Outside, the home offers an outdoor kitchenette (mini fridge and gas grill included) with outdoor dining space, an outdoor fire pit, a private dock, and a small beach area for all your lake adventures!Located in Nebo, just 45 minutes from Asheville, this upscale lakefront cabin is the perfect place to rest, relax, and recharge as you enjoy everything that the Lake James area has to offer. Build sandcastles and sunbathe on the mountain beach, cruise the lake in a boat, and or cool off by swimming at Paddy's Creek (3.9 miles away). Explore the many nearby hiking and biking trails within the community, or take a brief drive to the Linville Gorge Wilderness Area (15 miles away), Wolf Pit Trailhead of Shortoff Mountain (8.7 miles away), or the Linville River Trailhead via the Fonta Flora State Trail (5 miles away). After a full day of adventures grab a refreshing craft beer at Fonta Flora's open-air brewery at Whippoorwill Farm (1.5 miles away), or travel to the charming small town of Marion to enjoy another cold one or sample local cuisine (20 minutes away).Please Note: This home IS pet-friendly with an additional $100 pet fee per pet (max of 2). This home has 4 exterior cameras and a Ring Doorbell facing the driveway/parking area. This home has its own private boat dock and a small beach area on Lake James. The owner's boat and jet ski are docked, but there is an available spot for a guest boat and an additional jet ski. If interested in renting a boat during your stay, please contact Lake James Marina or Noah's Landing. While the home provides access to Lake James, it does NOT offer access to Camp Lake James amenities.

data.title: Morton Saltbox
data.description: Great 4 bedroom, 2 bath Montreat house. Easy walk 5 minute walk to conference center and Lake Susan. Youth groups and family groups are welcome. HOUSE LAYOUT: Main floor- Kitchen, dining room, living room with Roku TV (streaming only, Wi-Fi included) and queen sleeper sofa, bedroom with queen and full bath. Upstairs- bedroom with full, bedroom with a queen, bedroom with two sets of bunk beds (full bottom, twin top), full hall bath. PLEASE NOTE: This house does not have air-conditioning and sheets and towels are NOT supplied, but they are available for rent thru Greybeard Rentals.

data.title: Birdwood
data.description: Birdwood was completely renovated and added a brand-new HVAC system in 2024!Located within the gates of Montreat, Birdwood is a spacious 100-year-old, 3-story, 4,500-square-foot home with modern amenities. Features include a beautiful terrace and wrap-around porch. Birdwood sits on a large lot with a circular drive that provides ample space for guests to park and play. The layout of this historic home makes it perfect for a couple's getaway, church groups, family reunions, weddings, and corporate retreats. Birdwood can accommodate up to 20 guests with its 9 bedrooms (14 beds), 3 hall bathrooms, and 1 en suite bathroom.Each floor has a private entrance, kitchen, living/dining area, hall bathroom, multiple bedrooms, washer/dryer, connected workspace with a desk, and a unique outdoor space. The main floor features a large wrap-around porch. The top level has a screened-in porch. The lower level has a large patio with a fire pit, gas grill, and charcoal grill. The porch, patio, and main dining room can accommodate large gatherings. Perfect for togetherness AND privacy, this house serves as 3 homes in 1!HOUSE LAYOUT:#1. The lower level has 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a kitchen, and a living/dining space. The dining area has seating for 8 guests and a TV in the living room. All bedrooms have access to the hall bathroom with a walk-in shower. The laundry room has a full-sized washer/dryer and an additional refrigerator.The 1st bedroom has a queen bed with an in-room sink & vanity. The 2nd bedroom has a set of twin beds with trundles, it can sleep 4.The 3rd bedroom has a queen bed. The primary suite has a king bed, TV, and private bathroom with a walk-in shower. #2. The main level has a kitchen opening into the dining area and a family room with a TV. All bedrooms have access to the hall bathroom with shower/tub combination, a stacked washer/dryer, and the covered wrap-around porch.The 1st bedroom has a queen bed, vanity/sink, and porch access.The 2nd bedroom has two twin beds, an in-room sink, and porch access. #3. The upper level has a kitchen, a living area, and a dining area with seating for 6. All bedrooms have access to the hall bathroom with shower/tub combination and stacked washer/dryer. The screened porch has a small dining area and an antique daybed.The 1st bedroom has a queen bed, porch access, and an in-room sink.The 2nd bedroom has a king bed and an in-room sink.The 3rd bedroom has two twin beds. PLEASE NOTE: Birdwood had a total interior renovation that was completed in the summer of 2024. As part of that renovation, every piece of upholstered furniture has either been replaced with new furniture or has been reupholstered. This home is pet-friendly with an additional fee. There is a Ring Doorbell exterior security camera. High-speed WIFI is provided with extenders that allow excellent service on all 3 levels. Additional chairs and card tables are available in the main-level hall closet. The renter's closet with oversized kitchen supplies and an additional refrigerator is accessible in the first-floor laundry room.Greybeard supplies sheets, pillowcases, towels, and kitchen linens. During the summer conference season (June and July), linens will be packaged and placed on each bed. Outside of the summer conference season, beds will be made before guest arrival.

data.title: SaraKen
data.description: This Montreat cottage has all the modern conveniences including internet, cable TV, dishwasher and central A/C. You can spend time rocking on the front porch or enjoy the cool Montreat nights on the screened-in back porch. HOUSE LAYOUT: Main floor: living room, 1/2 bath, kitchen, sunroom(turned into a bedroom with a double bed), master bedroom with king & twin daybed and full bath. Upstairs: bedroom with queen and twin, full bath, bedroom with a double and a queen bed, full bath. Easy flat parking for 3-4 cars. Linens (sheets and towels) are available for an additional fee. This home is pet friendly, with a small fenced backyard, with an additional pet fee. From mid-January to mid-May, this home will rent monthly. Please reach out to inquire about SaraKen's monthly rates.

data.title: Christmas Tree Cabin
data.description: This beautiful, spacious log cabin is in a private, gated community, located on a mountain wildlife preserve. Enjoy watching turkeys, rabbits, colorful birds, and more while enjoying breakfast on the deck, overlooking views of Mount Mitchell. With 3 outside decks available for your enjoyment, two of which are covered, there is no shortage of outdoor seating. Two large great rooms, 2 dining areas, a spacious kitchen, 3 bedrooms, and 3 bathrooms prove ideal for groups. Sheets and towels are provided for your convenience. Above the garage is the game area which includes a Smart TV (streaming only), a ping pong table, a foosball table, an air hockey table, and cornhole. No cars are allowed in the garage.House Layout:Main Level- Living room with TV (Roku + YouTube TV) and wood stove; dining table seats 4; Kitchen table that seats 6; a bedroom with a full bed.Upper Level- Bedroom with a Queen bed, full bath, and Smart TV (streaming only). Note: The bathtub is NOT usable at this time.Lower Level- Bedroom with a King bed; Den with a Smart TV (streaming only); Full bathroom (shower only, no tub).Please note: Christmas Tree Cabin is pet friendly and will allow one dog under 25 lbs. with an additional pet fee. Homeowners will provide a kennel and request its use when guests are away from the home and leave their dogs unattended. Christmas Tree Cabin does not allow candles on the property. Guests should not bring any onto the property. The living room TV is equipped with Roku, which includes popular streaming apps like Netflix, Hulu, and Peacock, along with YouTube TV, which includes local news channels. During the colder winter months, icy and/or snowy road conditions and delayed snow plow operations are possible within the development. From December through March, please come prepared with AWD or 4WD vehicles. We also recommend travel insurance for those staying in the Gateway Mountain development during the winter months. No parking is allowed on roadways or at gate entrances. No RVs, boat trailers, camping trailers, or trailers of any kind are permitted in the Gateway Mountain Community.

data.title: The Nest
data.description: Nestled within a quiet neighborhood just 5 minutes from Asheville's city center, this quaint cottage has everything needed for a comfortable & convenient extended stay, including a washer and dryer, a connected desk station with high-speed WIFI, a Smart TV, and a private backyard and deck! Perfect for a writer's escape, romantic getaway, or those seeking quick access to genuine regional experiences, The Nest embraces vintage charm & modern style to ensure a stay filled with plenty of rest, relaxation, and recreation!House Layout: Main Level- 65" OLED Smart TV with Sonos surround sound speaker system (streaming only); Fully-equipped kitchen w/gas range stove, stainless appliances, granite countertops, island, standard coffee maker, Vitamix, InstantPot, and dishwasher; Eat-in nook w/seating for up to 4; Laundry area w/stackable washer & dryer; Bedroom with memory foam queen bed; Full hall bath w/walk-in rain shower; Bedroom w/XL memory foam twin bed, desk station with high-speed WIFI, full set of yoga props, and essential oil diffuser for aromatherapy. Outdoors- Small, private backyard and deck with bistro seating for 2.Please note: This home is NOT pet friendly. The driveway allows parking for up to 3 cars (depending on car size) along with ample off-street parking. While the home does NOT have central AC, it does have a mini-split air conditioning unit. This home rents monthly. Included in the monthly rent is a $400 monthly utility allowance power and $100 monthly water allowance. Any overages are to be reimbursed by the tenant.

data.title: Blue Ridge Bliss
data.description: Escape to your own secluded slice of mountain paradise at Blue Ridge Bliss! Named one of the "Best Vacation Rentals in Asheville" by Business Insider, this spacious home perched atop nearly 10 wooded acres offers privacy, breathtaking views, a combination of luxury amenities and rustic charm, and a short walk to trails and cycling. Relax with unobstructed views of layers of mountains, cozy up to the fire pit, or enjoy evening meals on the newly-added patio dining set on the large wraparound porch. Completely renovated in 2009, this home features a stunning, floor-to-ceiling stone fireplace, hardwood floors, and tongue-and-groove cedar paneling. The central living room includes 180 degrees of windows with postcard-worthy views of mountains and sunsets. Large, open kitchen features granite countertops, double oven, pantry, oversized copper farm sink, five-burner propane gas stove, and Keurig coffee maker. The upper loft includes additional seating, a smart TV with Roku streaming & DirecTV cable, and a space to work. Enjoy music in the loft and main level through six Bluetooth-connected ceiling speakers. A lower living area includes a 65” smart TV with Roku streaming & DirecTV cable and 5.1 speaker surround sound. A private primary suite with an en suite bath on the lower level opens onto the stone patio. The second and third bedrooms have full en-suite baths. The third bedroom with bunk beds has a sliding barn door to separate it from the den area.Nestled off of Ox Creek Road near the intersection of Elk Mountain Scenic Highway and The Blue Ridge Parkway, the home is within walking distance to popular hiking trails and cycling along the Parkway. Secluded but centrally located, the adorable town of Weaverville offers several local, delicious restaurants and brewery options. The home is also just a short drive to Asheville (20 minutes) and the town of Black Mountain, which provide even more culinary, shopping, and outdoor experiences.Please Note: A brand new water filtration system was added in October 2020, however, it does not apply to outdoor water supply.  The hot tub is serviced and cleaned weekly, but due to natural minerals in the well water, it can appear discolored. Rest assured that it is safe for soaking! A Pack N Play was added in February 2023. Firewood is not provided as part of the rental. We recommend picking up a bundle of firewood at one of our local Ingles grocery stores. This house is pet-friendly with an additional pet fee. There is an exterior security camera. During the colder winter months, icy and/or snowy road conditions can become extreme. From December through March, please come prepared with AWD or 4WD vehicles. Read Business Insider's review of Blue Ridge Bliss, and see why it was voted one of the "Best Vacation Rentals in Asheville" here: www (dot) businessinsider (dot) com/best-vacation-rentals-cabins-asheville#blue-ridge-parkway-secluded-stay-399-8

data.title: Chidi San Memory
data.description: This historic home has all of the charms of Montreat with the convenience of a newly renovated kitchen and bathrooms, as well as heat and cooling. The large porch with ceiling fans and rocking chairs make Chidi San Memory a welcoming place for families, friends, and groups to reconnect and get refreshed. Ideally located in a lovely part of Montreat, it's a short 8-minute walk to Lake Susan, and only a 5-minute drive to downtown Black Mountain. Well-behaved dogs are welcome (sorry, we're allergic to cats). Private drive with parking for 3 cars.HOUSE LAYOUT: Main Floor- Kitchen, living room with a dining room, bedroom 1 with queen, full hall bath.Upstairs- bedroom 2 with two full beds, bedroom 3 with two twins (one of these beds is an antique and is slighter larger than a twin so full sheets will fit better), bedroom 4 with two twins, two full baths. Each upstairs bedroom has its own balcony.Please note: Sheets and towels are NOT supplied. The wood-burning fireplace is NOT usable.

data.title: Carrie's Escape
data.description: This unique and charming 1947 cabin boasts original hardwood floors, exterior walls crafted from trees on the property, and nearly three generations of character and historical touches. Located only a few hundred feet from Camp Rockmont, the site of the popular LEAF Festival, Carrie's Escape provides a private but convenient home base for exploring Western North Carolina.About the Home• Kitchen with eat-in dining for 4 (and up to 6 with the leaf provided), dishwasher, French press, and drip-style coffee maker• Thoughtfully appointed living room with radiant heat woodstove and RokuTV for streaming• Light and bright sunroom with seating, dedicated workspace, and access to the patio with gas grill• Impressive open-air deck, perfect for stargazing or enjoying the view, with a wood-burning fire pitWhere to Unwind • Bedroom with twin-size bed• Bedroom with full-size bed• Bedroom with queen-size bed and en suite bathroom with walk-in shower• Bedroom with queen-size bed; a full bathroom, with bathtub and shower combination, can be accessed from this bedroom and the hallwayWhere to Explore• Camp Rockmount | 15-minute walk• Thirteen Pennies Cafe + Mountain Home Thrift Store  | 3 minutes• Dynamite Coffee | 6 minutes• My Father's Pizza, Downtown Black Mountain | 8 minutes• Blue Ridge Parkway | 14 minutes• White Duck Taco, Downtown Asheville | 22 minutes• Biltmore Estate & Gardens | 22 minutesPlease Note: 4WD is not required but please drive in and out slowly. The last part of the driveway ascends slightly. At certain points, vehicles with low clearance may scrape. This home does not allow pets.

data.title: Ashevilla
data.description: Nestled in a private community on Town Mountain, this spacious, well-appointed home has incredible proximity to shops and restaurants at only one mile from downtown. Overlook the beautiful skyline of downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Mountains from your perch-above-it-all, Ashevilla!About the Home• Impressive main level great room with dining for 6, breakfast bar seating for 2, 55" cable TV with DVD player, gas log fireplace, and adjoining sunroom.• Thoughtfully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, Keurig coffee maker, and standard, drip-style coffee maker.• Spacious screened-in porch and open-air deck with a variety of rocking chairs, dining, and seating options.• Private and romantic side patio with bistro table for 2.• Hot tub overlooking the Blue Ridge Mountains and Downtown Asheville.• This house is pet friendly with an additional pet fee.Where to Unwind• The main level offers a primary bedroom with a king-size bed and en suite bathroom (walk-in shower).• A second bedroom on the main floor offers two twin-size beds and a full bathroom (walk-in shower only) with hallway access.• The lower level offers a third bedroom with a king-size bed, cable TV, and an en suite bathroom with a bathtub and shower.• The fourth bedroom, also on the lower level, offers a king-size bed, a sitting area with cable TV, and access to the lower deck. A full bathroom with a walk-in shower can be accessed from the hallway.Where to Explore• Nearest Gas, Shell | 6 minutes• Omni Grove Park Inn | 8 minutes• Wicked Weed Brewing | 8 minutes• Nearest Grocery, Harris Teeter and Trader Joe's | 10 minutes• Taco Billy, Haywood Road | 13 minutes• Bear Wallow Trail | 34 minutesPlease Note: Ashevilla is rented monthly. Included with the monthly rent is a $400 monthly power allowance and a $100 monthly water allowance. Any overage would be reimbursed by the tenant.

data.title: Black Bear Cottage
data.description: Historic and charming, this generational Montreat home boasts a covered front porch with outdoor seating and is located less than a 5-minute walk to Lake Susan and the Montreat Conference Center. The main floor offers a cozy living room with a TV (cable, Fire Stick, and DVD player available), a dining room with seating for up to 8, a kitchen with 2 standard drip coffeemakers (no dishwasher available), a full hall bath with a shower & tub combo, and a bedroom with two twin beds. There is also a stackable washer and dryer. Upstairs, you'll find another full hall bath with a clawfoot tub and shower and two bedrooms, each with two full-size beds. Explore Montreat's endless trail system that winds through lush rhododendrons, alongside babbling creeks, and that scales cliff faces overlooking the valley and towns below. For avid hikers, Lookout Mountain is a great trail that rings in at just under a mile long and offers stunning panoramic mountain views, and there's also the epic 4.8-mile Graybeard trail with several spur trails, including one that leads to Walker Knob and another that leads to Graybeard Falls. Black Bear Cottage is also less than 10 minutes from Black Mountain. Known as the “Front Porch of Western North Carolina,” you’ll spot the iconic red rocking chairs throughout this treasured small town that stand as your reminder to slow down, pull up a chair, and relax. While in town, stop by Lookout Brewing or Black Mountain Brewing for a local brew, browse the many gift shops, and grab a bite at Fresh Woodfired Pizza & Pasta, Louise's Kitchen, or Trailhead Kitchen. The home is also just 25 minutes from the iconic Biltmore Estate and downtown Asheville, where you can explore art galleries, dine at award-winning restaurants, and shop for souvenirs to remind you of your special time in the mountains! Please Note: This home is NOT pet friendly and does NOT rent to youth groups. Linens are NOT provided but can be rented from Greybeard Rentals for an additional fee. There are approximately 42 steps from the parking area to the main entrance. A washer & dryer were added in March 2025.

data.title: Moondance
data.description: Survey the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains from the top of Grants Mountain from the back deck of Moondance. Located within a dark skies community, enjoy the constellations and moon dance across the sky on a clear night. Located just minutes from I-40, situated between Asheville and Hickory, Moondance is a short drive to the shopping area and hospital. Paved roads make easy access to this mountaintop paradise, however, it is RECOMMENDED TO ARRIVE DURING DAYLIGHT HOURS.There are 3 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms on one level. Vaulted ceilings throughout this open floor plan bring the beauty of the outdoors in. Large deck to relax in the hot tub under the moon and stars. Make family memories where you gather around the large stone wood-burning fireplace, share a great meal prepared in the chef's kitchen, roast s'mores around the newly added outdoor fire pit, or play with your pup in the large, fully fenced backyard! Cabin Layout:Open floor plan for living room, dining, and kitchen. One-level living at its best! The living room has a TV and a wood fireplace. The dining table seats 6. The primary suite has a king bed with a full bath. The two guests each have queen beds and share a full bath in the hallway. Great deck with a hot tub and incredible views! A fire pit area with seating for 6 and a fenced yard area at the back of the cabin. Level 2 EV charger. Please Note: This house is pet-friendly for up to 2 dogs with an additional pet fee per dog. Dogs are required to be current with flea and tick medication. Due to allergies, cats are not permitted. For security reasons, there are EXTERIOR security cameras (at the front door, driveway, and shed area), and the homeowner confirms the number of pets brought to the home via these exterior cameras. It is best to purchase a small bundle of wood or Duraflame pressed logs at the local grocery store. The fireplace is NOT operable from Memorial Day to Labor Day.Greybeard homes are located near Pisgah National Forest. Ladybugs and Kudzu Beetles are prevalent in our area in the fall and winter months, and they will find their way into homes to escape the cooler weather. They are not poisonous and cannot be exterminated.

data.title: Presler-McLaurin Cabin
data.description: Wonderful log home within an easy walk to the Montreat Conference grounds. House layout: Main floor: dining table for 6 and 2 kitchen bar seats; full hall bath (shower only-no tub); Bedroom with a queen bed and a full bath; bedroom with a double bed Upstairs: bunk room with 3 twins and a double bed; full bath ( shower only, no tub)PLEASE NOTE: This house does not supply linens (sheets and towels) but are available for rent thru Greybeard Rentals. THE FIREPLACE IS NOT USABLE DURING THE SUMMER.

data.title: Lakeview Knoll
data.description: You'll find nothing more relaxing than the incredible views and convenient location at Lakeview Knoll. Sit out on the deck and take in the breathtaking lake and mountain views. Lake Tomahawk Park, located directly across the street, features a .55-mile walking trail, a community swimming pool, a playground, a picnic pavilion, and tennis courts. You're a short walk from downtown Black Mountain, recently voted by TripAdvisor as one of the Prettiest Small Towns in America to Vacation.?House Layout: Main floor: Living room w/ flat screen TV and gas log fireplace; Dining room with seating for 6; updated kitchen features gas range and island with seating for 4; Laundry/Mudroom w/ extra storage and workspace. Sunroom with lake view and office area (full-size sleeper sofa). Master Suite with queen bed and full bath (shower only); 2nd bedroom with a queen bed; full hall bath; and 3rd bedroom with a queen bed. Basement: Bedroom with a king bed; Full bath (shower only); Game room with ping pong table and TV. The sofa converts to a double and a single bed. Outdoors: Deck with gas grill; lake and mountain views.

data.title: Sweetwood Lodge
data.description: Sweetwood Lodge overlooks the majestic Blue Ridge Mountain Range. Enjoy the ever-changing mountain view by day and marvel at the brilliant stars against the inky black sky at night. Mount Mitchell, the tallest peak east of the Mississippi River, is directly in view. The property is located in Gateway Mountain, a 3,000-acre hardwood forest and preserve, which offers a peaceful respite from hectic day-to-day life. In addition to the varied and breathtaking vistas, guests within Gateway enjoy unspoiled, woodland surroundings and amenities including hiking trails, a private lake in which you can swim if you'd like, a spectacular and private waterfall park and picnic area, and even a small catch and release trout pond (no license required). We find that time spent on the mountain is always uplifting and restorative and would love for Sweetwood Lodge to be the home base for your getaway.House Layout:MAIN FLOOR- Open living room and dining area, artfully appointed, with sliders opening onto the spacious upper deck. The living room has a 70" TV (Direct TV included) and a fireplace with gas logs. There is a bedroom with a queen bed across from the full hall bath with a jacuzzi tub and hand-held shower. A very fully equipped kitchen makes the preparation of anything from a simple snack to a large holiday feast a pleasure for the cook(s) in your group. The primary suite has a King bed and opens onto the screen porch, (which is also accessible from the upper deck), and a full bath features a multi-jet shower. A laundry/mud room with a washer/dryer is also on this level.LOWER LEVEL- Den with a sectional couch, 50-inch TV with DVD player, game table seating 4-6, and a collection of board games, playing cards, puzzles, and books. An electric Franklin Stove provides both extra warmth and charm to the space. Sliders open onto the lower level deck and a bedroom with a queen bed has a full hall bath (shower only, no tub). The library contains books, travel brochures, local reference materials, and a wireless printer for guest use. A "mini gym" with a spin bike, exercise bands, and free weights are available for use as well.OUTDOORS- Gas grill off the kitchen door, bistro seating for two on the front porch, two large mountain-facing decks, and a screen porch. The upper deck has a dining table with seating for six adjacent to the wood-burning chimney. The lower deck is furnished with four Adirondack chairs and another bistro set seating two. The screen porch is outfitted to seat four, but can easily accommodate six with extra folding chairs.Sweetwood Lodge is a true mountain retreat, yet its proximity to the community gate (just 1 mile) on a gently sloping, paved street provides easy access to main roads. It's a comfortable and often very scenic drive to a great variety of active outdoor pursuits, charming mountain towns, small artisanal farms and markets, artist studios/galleries, restaurants, breweries, and historical sights.Nearby Attractions: • I40: 10 minutes• Black Mountain: 15-20 minutes• Asheville: 35-40 minutes• Lake Lure/Chimney Rock: 30 minutes• Blue Ridge Parkway: 25 minutes• Lake James: 40 minutesPlease note: We love animals, but please NO PETS and NO SMOKING in this home. This home is equipped with family-friendly amenities that include a Pack and Play, highchair, children’s tableware and sippy cups, and children’s books & games. During the colder winter months, icy and/or snowy road conditions and delayed snow plow operations are possible within the development. From December through March, please come prepared with AWD or 4WD vehicles. We also recommend travel insurance for those staying in the Gateway Mountain development during the winter months. The garage is NOT included in the rental. No parking is allowed on roadways or at gate entrances. No RVs, boat trailers, camping trailers, or trailers of any kind are permitted in the Gateway Mountain Community.

data.title: Birdsong at Lake James
data.description: Ideally located in the private and upscale 1780 neighborhood of the Camp Lake James community, this charming three-bedroom, three-and-one-half-bath home sleeps up to 8 people comfortably and offers an expansive screened porch, two living rooms, an outdoor fire pit, and a gas grill.About the Home• Impressive and well-equipped kitchen with eat-in dining for 8 and island seating for 4, gas range, dishwasher, and Keurig coffee maker.• Living room with 64" TV for streaming and access to the spacious screened-in porch with outdoor seating and living space.• Lower-level family room with 74" TV for streaming and access to the patio with gas grill and outdoor fire pit with seating for 4.Where to Unwind• The upper level boasts a primary suite with king-size bed, 42" TV for streaming, and en suite bathroom with a walk-in shower and soaking tub.• The upper level also offers a second bedroom with a king-size bed and en suite bathroom with walk-in shower.• The lower level offers a bedroom with two queen-size beds. A full bathroom, with a walk-in shower, can be accessed from the family room.Where to ExploreLocated just 45 minutes from Asheville in Nebo, this upscale home is the perfect place to get away and enjoy everything the Lake James area has to offer. Outside of the community, you can spend your days exploring nearby hiking trails like the Fonta Flora Loop in Lake James State Park or High Shoal Falls in South Mountains State Park before grabbing a refreshing craft beer at Fonta Flora’s open-air brewery at Whippoorwill Farm. Less than 25 minutes away, you’ll find the quaint small town of Marion where you can grab another cold one at Mica Town Brewing Company, fresh seafood and a cocktail at Crabby Abby’s Bar and Grille, or a handcrafted dish paired with the NC staple, Cheerwine, at McDowell Local.Before returning to your home away from home, shop around at the Lake James Antique Mall, or take a short 30-minute drive to the “Simply Charming” town of Morganton where you can find boutiques, novelty shops, regional museums, and art galleries to pick up a souvenir to remind you of your time in the mountains.Please Note: This home is pet-friendly with an additional fee. This home does NOT have access to Camp Lake James amenities.

data.title: Mountain Over Main Street
data.description: Overlooking the Blue Ridge Mountains and less than 1 mile from picturesque Downtown Weaverville, Mountain Over Main Street is sure to leave you with an abundance of memories and stories of the charming hidden gems and local favorites found throughout town. About the Home• Well-equipped, galley-style kitchen with gas range, dishwasher, and drip-style coffee maker.• Interior dining for 6 and outdoor dining for 8.• Living room with 60" SmartTV for streaming.• Screened-in porch with 3 swings, couch, and coffee table; access to the spacious deck with outdoor dining, gas grill, and garden with native plants; wrap-around access to covered seating on the front porch, overlooking the mountain view.• Wood burning fire pit with natural stone seating.Where to Unwind• The main level offers a primary bedroom with a stunning picture window, a king-size bed, and an en suite bathroom (walk-in shower). • The upper level offers two bedrooms, one with a queen-size bed and one with a full-over-full bunk bed (with 1 twin-size trundle); a full bathroom (bathtub and shower combination) can be accessed from the hallway.• The bonus room, steps down from the main floor, boasts a sitting area with a sleeper sofa, a card table with games, and a woodburning stove.Where to Explore• Blue Mountain Pizza & Downtown Weaverville | 0.6 miles• Reems Creek Golf Club | 7 minutes• Downtown Asheville | 14 minutes• Blue Ridge Parkway | 15 minutes• Navitat Canopy Adventures | 18 minutes• Biltmore Estate | 19 minutesPlease note: IF USING THE EXTRA BEDDING (TWIN TRUNDLE BED OR SLEEPER SOFA), YOU MUST BRING YOUR OWN SHEETS. This home does not allow pets. The converted bonus room utilizes heating and cooling from the main floor of the home and does not have its own ductwork; an electric heater and wood-burning stove are available. There is an exterior security camera facing the driveway.

data.title: Stepping Stone
data.description: Tranquil and exquisite, Stepping Stone is located in Black Mountain's charming Cheshire Village and offers 4 bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms, and ample space for fellowship and entertainment. Walk to the heart of Cheshire for lunch, take a five-minute trip to beautiful Black Mountain for superb food and shopping, or visit Asheville, the Blue Ridge Parkway, and the Biltmore Estate, which are less than 30 minutes away.About the Home• The kitchen boasts top-of-the-line Viking appliances with a gas range, dishwasher, drip-style coffee maker, and Keurig coffee maker.• Open-concept dining area with seating for 8 overlooking the living room with a wood-burning fireplace.• Covered porch with a wood-burning fireplace and cozy seating.• Lower-level recreation space with gas log fireplace, daybed-style seating, and game table.• For added convenience, a powder room is available on the main floor. Where to Unwind• The main floor primary bedroom offers a king-size bed, TV, and en suite bathroom with a walk-in shower and soaking tub.• The upper-level offers two bedrooms, each with a queen-size bed, along with a full bathroom (bathtub and shower combination), which can be accessed from the hallway.• Open-air loft with twin-size daybed, designated workspace, and TV.• Lower-level bedroom with king-size bed and en suite bathroom with bathtub and shower combination. Where to Explore• Beradu Specialty Market | 5 minute walk• Sake Sushi | 5 minute walk• Nearest Gas, Ingles iMarket | 3 minutes• Nearest Grocery, Ingles Market | 3 minutes• Downtown Black Mountain | 4 minutes• Lookout Mountain Trail Head | 13 minutes• The Blue Ridge Parkway | 13 minutes• Downtown Asheville | 19 minutes• The Biltmore Estate | 25 minutesPlease Note: True to its name, Stepping Stone requires navigating 20 stone steps from the parking space to the main entrance. Parking is available for up to 2 vehicles, with overflow parking available nearby. This home is pet-friendly for up to 2 dogs, with an additional fee.
